citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 345 pm on
10-DEC-19.
Inspector arrived at 345 pm and found locked gate to driveway. Inspector called 3 phone numbers for facility and
left messages on 2 of those numbers. The third rang with no answer or machine answering. Inspector waited until
430 pm before leaving facility.

narrative:
2.126(b)                    REPEAT
ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 345 pm on
10-DEC-19.
Inspector arrived at 345 pm and found locked gate to driveway.   Inspector called 3 phone numbers for facility and
left messages on 2 of those numbers.  The third rang with no answer or machine answering.  Inspector waited until
430 pm before leaving facility.
